topics.body:
"@SidewardManatee":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547f88106368727379d40000#post_547f88106368727379d40000
I used to be fucking TERRIFYED of spiders. I'm talking "piss my pants and run very far away" levels of scared. But then my granddad took me to a nature museum and they had a tarantula they would let kids look at and hold. My granddad through some miracle got me to hold it and pet it. And that's how my love affair with arachnids began.
